title: Who are the people that do technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Below are the top 25 people who will have the most influence in tech in 2019, according to the Stack Overflow survey. Lisa Su, Advanced Micro Devices CEO.Jon Skeet, staff software engineer at Google. ...Demis Hassabis, Google DeepMind CEO and founder. ...Jack Ma, Alibaba cofounder and chairman. ...Werner Vogels, Amazon CTO. ...
